label: A Visual History of Poitou in the Seventeeth Century

metadata.label: Context Frame
metadata.value: Master's Degree 'Technologies numériques appliquées à l'histoire'

description.@value: Map and city views from the region and Poitou and the city of Poitiers drawn or engraved in the seventeenth century, documenting toponyms and medieval monuments.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Built by Henri II Plantagenet, the Poitiers fortification was augmented and restaured several times between the 12th and the 14th century. In the 17th, it was in poor condition.
resource.chars: Built by Henri II Plantagenet, the Poitiers fortification was augmented and restaured several times between the 12th and the 14th century. In the 17th, it was in poor condition.
